name: Cursed Treasure HD
description:
Play one of the all-time best tower strategy games. Defense strategy gaming at its finest: Jay is Games "Best Of", FGL "Most Addictive", top strategy game on Kongregate and Addicting Games - now custom made for iPad with awesome new iPad-exclusive features.

Play the bad guy - a ruthless Overlord with the combined might of orcs, undead, and demons at your command. You've worked hard to amass your ill-gotten gain, but wave after wave of self-appointed heroes want to take your Gems. Set your defenses and destroy the heroes, always keeping one thing in mind: Don't Touch My Gems!

- Protect your Gems from waves of pilfering heroes
- Awesome towers with 12 different upgrades and unique powers
- 33 epic skills to unlock and add to your firepower, including new iPad exclusive skills
- Devastating spells like Meteor and Frenzy to unleash on the invaders
- 30 challenging levels tuned exclusively for the iPad
- Exclusive iPad premium items to help you crush those pesky heroes
- Many hours of play and replay to achieve the coveted "Brilliant" rating on all levels and the 24 Gamecenter achievements
